question: The HCF of two numbers is 4, and their LCM is 84. If one of the numbers is 12, find the other number.
Two numbers are 36 and 48. If their HCF is 12, what is their LCM?
The HCF of three numbers is 2, and their LCM is 180. If two of the numbers are 12 and 18, can you find the third number using the HCF and LCM relationship?
The least number which is exactly divisible by 32, 24 and 40 is ___ ?
The HCF of two numbers is 6, and their LCM is 180. If one number is 36, find the other number.
Two numbers share a greatest divisor of 9 and a smallest shared multiple of 108. If one of the numbers is 27, find the other.
Two numbers are such that their smallest shared multiple is 180, and their greatest divisor is 6. If one number is 30, find the other number.
Two ropes 14 meters and 21 meters long are to be cut into small pieces of equal lengths. What will be the maximum length of each piece?

A baker has 72 chocolate cookies and 96 vanilla cookies. He wants to arrange them in trays with the same number of each type of cookie on each tray, using the maximum number of trays possible.

a) How many trays will he need?
b) How many cookies of each type will be on each tray?

Three buses leave the station at 6:00 AM. Bus A returns to the station every 45 minutes, Bus B every 60 minutes, and Bus C every 90 minutes. When will all three buses be at the station at the same time again?
Three people attend yoga classes at intervals of 12, 15 and 18 days. They all attended a class on January 1, 2024. When will they next attend a class together?
Find the smallest number which when increased by 11 is exactly divisible by both 220 and 616.

In a race, three friends start running together. Their strides measure 24 cm, 28 cm, and 32 cm respectively. What is the minimum distance each should run so that they all cross the finish line at the same time with complete strides?
Which of the following options is incorrect?
options: LCM of two numbers is always less than or equal to both the numbers.
The smallest multiple of a number is the number itself.
Relationship between HCF and LCM doesnâ€™t hold for three numbers.

question: The least number which when decreased by 3 is exactly divisible by 10, 16, 20, and 25 is:
